Compression Estimator

Estimate gzip and brotli compression sizes for your content locally in your browser.


      

    

    
    

      
FAQ

      

        Is my data sent to a server?
        
No. All processing happens locally in your browser.

      

      

        How accurate are the estimates?
        
These are actual compression results using the CompressionStream API, so they're accurate for the current browser implementation.
